description:
DrainMe (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#14-145) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- seed.length = _add (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#114)

DrainMe (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#14-145) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- players.push(msg.sender) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#73)

DrainMe.unlockSecret() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#85-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- secret % 5 == 0 (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#88)

DrainMe.callFirstTarget() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#97-101) ignores return value by firstTarget.call.value(msg.value)() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#100)

DrainMe.callSecondTarget() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#103-107) ignores return value by secondTarget.call.value(msg.value)() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#106)

DrainMe.winPrize() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#131-134) ignores return value by owner.call.value(1)() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#133)
